donor_name: UNITED STATES AGENCY FOR INTERNATIONAL DEVELOPMENT (USAID)
Ministry of Foreign Affairs and Trade of the Republic of korea
outputs.output_descr: UNCTs, under the leadership and guidance of the UN Resident Coordinator support national level process to stimulate debate on the post 2015 development agenda. UNCTs will partner with national authorities to help convening different development stakeholders, contribute to social dialogue and providing relevant knowledge to identify development challenges, opportunities and solutions with a bottom-up approach rationale. These national consultations will be supported, if requested, by UNDG's capacities at regional and headquarters levels.
Thematic consultations with academia, media, private sector, employers and trade unions, civil society, and others to discuss key issues pertaining to the post-2015 development agenda.

donor_name: THE WILLIAM AND FLORA HEWLETT FOUNDATION
Ministry of Foreign Affairs and Trade of the Republic of korea
outputs.output_descr: Preparatory Conferences/events/meetings by/with partners which discuss the Post2015 development agenda

donor_name: Ministry of Foreign Affairs and Trade of the Republic of korea
outputs.output_descr: In order to frame the discussions and consultations that the initiative will be supporting, this output is aimed at assisting in producing background papers and evidence-based knowledge products on issues relevant to the post-2015 development agenda. This including think pieces and knowledge products on regional development challenges, civil society views about the post-2015 agenda

donor_name: Foundation  for the UN Global Compact
Ministry of Foreign Affairs and Trade of the Republic of korea
outputs.output_descr: Leverage ICT tools to facilitate an open interaction and information exchange about Post2015

donor_name: THE WILLIAM AND FLORA HEWLETT FOUNDATION
outputs.output_descr: Support to the set up and functioning of the Secretary General's High Level Panel secretariat of Eminent persons on Post-2015 Development Agenda

donor_name: Ministry of Foreign Affairs and Trade of the Republic of korea
Ministry of Foreign Affairs and Trade of the Republic of korea
outputs.output_descr: Continuing Inclusive Dialogue on the Post-2015 Development Agenda around the means of implementation

This initiative aims at two main outcomes:
(1) Build and lead a strategic coalition of partners that can shape the post-2015 development agenda through global mobilisation and engagement; and
(2) ensure that the post-2015 development agenda is (a) guided by core UN norms, values and commitments; (b) informed and shaped by the critical challenges of our time, including sustainability and equity; and (c) built on the momentum of and lessons learned from the MDGs.

project_descr: Facilitating an evidence base and open dialogue on the post-2015 development agenda
project_title: Facilitating evidence base&open dialogue on post-2015 DA
